snippet: The actor and writer-director of “Anesthesia,” a new film, lives with his wife, Lisa Benavides-Nelson, and sons.
lead_paragraph: The actor and writer-director of “Anesthesia,” a new film, lives with his wife, Lisa Benavides-Nelson, and sons.
abstract: Actor, writer and director Tim Blake Nelson loves sprawling Upper West Side penthouse he and his wife created from five small apartments on top floor of prewar building; space is where he writes every day, enjoys his collections, and where nightly dinner with his wife and children is mandatory family time.

headline.main: Tim Blake Nelson on the Upper West Side
headline.print_headline: Sleeps Five, Not Counting Baby Grand
